result.eng: Strangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.
result.ga: Aisteach go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíochta agus ní in Éirinn
result.orig: Aisteach go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíochta agus ní in Éirinn
result.html: Aisteach go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíochta agus ní in ÉirinnStrangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Aisteaċ go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíoċta agus ní in ÉirinnStrangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.
